pullrequest.title: Converter: add `<map>` element for converting fixed values

content.raw:
> this implementation only maps the first value, and doesn't map sibling elements

Oh my understanding was different. The PR description says "_If there are an equal number of //from/value and //to/value elements, then the map is constructed with the //from/value mapped to //to/value based on the order they are specified (1st with 1st, 2nd with 2nd, etc)"_.
content.html:
this implementation only maps the first value, and doesn't map sibling elements

Oh my understanding was different. The PR description says "If there are an equal number of //from/value and //to/value elements, then the map is constructed with the //from/value mapped to //to/value based on the order they are specified (1st with 1st, 2nd with 2nd, etc)".
